name: NSApplication.AboutPanelOptionKey
desc: Keys to include in the options dictionary when displaying an About panel.

items.name: static let applicationIcon: NSApplication.AboutPanelOptionKey
items.desc: The icon to display for the app in the About panel.

items.name: static let applicationName: NSApplication.AboutPanelOptionKey
items.desc: The name of the application to display in the About panel.

items.name: static let applicationVersion: NSApplication.AboutPanelOptionKey
items.desc: The version information to display in the About panel.

items.name: static let credits: NSApplication.AboutPanelOptionKey
items.desc: The credits string to display in the About panel.

items.name: static let version: NSApplication.AboutPanelOptionKey
items.desc: The version number to display in the About panel.
